articles.title: ICMR issues guidance for appropriate recording of COVID-19 deaths to create robust data - The Hindu
articles.description: In its guidance for appropriate recording of COVID-10 deaths in India, the ICMR said deaths with inconclusive test results, but in which coronavirus symptoms are present will be recorded as “probable COVID-19” fatalities
